PM Modi in Varanasi: Ganga cruise, Dev Diwali and mor

Prime Minister Narendra Modi lit the first 'diya' on 'Dev Deepawali' and set off celebrations for the festival that is marked by lighting lakhs of earthen lamps on the banks of the Ganga in Varanasi.

Farmers’ Delhi Chalo protest march against new farm laws

The Delhi Police on Friday used tear gas shells to disperse a group of farmers who had reached the Singhu border as part of their 'Delhi Chalo' march to protest against the Centre's new farm laws.

Cyclone Nivar intensifies; Tamil Nadu, Puducherry brace for severe cyclonic storm

Severe cyclonic storm 'Nivar' will intensify into a very severe cyclonic storm over the next 12 hours and cross the coast between Tamil Nadu and Puducherry Wednesday midnight or early Thursday.
